keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject

byline.contributor: Aurelien Breeden contributed reporting from Paris.

lead_paragraph: The United Nations accused France of delaying an investigation into accusations that its troops sexually abused children in the Central African Republic.

headline.print_headline: U.N. Official Says France Delayed Abuse Inquiry
headline.main: U.N. Official Accuses France of Delays in Child Sexual Abuse Case

snippet: The United Nations accused France of delaying an investigation into accusations that its troops sexually abused children in the Central African Republic.
abstract: United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights Zeid Ra'ad al-Hussein accuses France of delaying investigation of allegations that French soldiers in Central African Republic sexually abused children; uproar over allegations has spurred United States to urge inquiry and has focused attention on UN's process for holding peacekeepers accountable.
